content.title: Change Free Form Attributes
content.body:
1. From the Project explorer on the top left of your canvas, navigate to flxHeader > mainContainer.
  2. From the Properties panel, expand Look > Flex on the top right of your canvas.
  3. Change the Left property to 60 Dp.
    The Search1 widget moves right relative to the parent FlexContainer widget.
  4. Change the Top value to 59 Dp.
    The Search1 widget moves down relative to the parent FlexContainer widget.
  5. Set the Top and Left properties to 0 Dp.
    The Search1 widget moves to its original position.
